headline: Should BlueBird 6’s High-Capacity Launch Plans Require Action From AST SpaceMobile (ASTS) Investors?
summary: AST SpaceMobile is preparing to launch its next-generation BlueBird 6 satellite, featuring the largest commercial phased array in low Earth orbit and significantly higher data capacity, as part of a broader plan to scale a direct-to-smartphone broadband network through expanded Florida and Texas manufacturing sites and multiple launches into 2026. Backed by billions in contracted revenue commitments from telecom partners such as Verizon and Saudi Telecom Group, AST SpaceMobile is using...
